attributes.title: Disgusting
attributes.review: Worst app I’ve ever downloaded...Or atleast tried too. It took six days for it to finally download onto my phone and after, it kept crashing on me. I don’t feel like I have to go into too much detail about this since who would be dumb enough to download an app with 2 stars?

attributes.title: Are you serious
attributes.review: What is the purpose of this app other than to take up space for more deserving apps. I cannot believe the things that are acceptable in the App Store now a days. I remember the time when apps were held to a higher standard now it seems as if anything will get in.

attributes.title: BLM
attributes.review: This is the worst app in the world. It took 15 hours to download, and my WiFi was not the problem. Every time I clicked to get into the app it just glitched me out. This app definitely needs some improvement. I would not recommend this app at all, and if I could give it a 0 star I would.

attributes.title: Weird bathroom
attributes.review: When i use a Public restroom i expect it to be at least up to health codes. But this is UNEXPECTABLE. The first thing i saw when i entered the bathroom was a large rat eatting a Cheeto. When i tried to remove the rat it said something about all rats matter and hid in its bunker. If you going to put a rat in the bathroom, make sure it isn’t a rapist.

attributes.title: My child is scarred
attributes.review: my child downloaded this app and was instantly mortified when he found out this “trump” guy preys on little children and has seggs with them against their will. he was also sad to find out that he kills black people for fun 😡😡😡 would give this app 0 stars but it won’t let me

attributes.title: major malfunctions
attributes.review: i downloaded the app to support our president and when i downloaded it an alarm blared through the speakers and water began to fill my house all the way up to the second floor! i tried to get it out and figure out why it happened but then sharks started to swim trough my house and eat my cabinets! i’m terrified of sharks and i don’t know what to do. one of the sharks swallowed my grandpa and drowned my mom! this app is cursed! i was able to drain the water from my house but now there’s crabs in my ceiling and fish in my bed. i don’t recommend this app.

attributes.title: Sad tears
attributes.review: I never thought I would be here today saying this but... wow i thought I was going to get educated about our president but o got the opposite instead a video popped up of “Its raining tacos” I can’t complain it was beautiful but was here for some political lesson instead I got a stock man singing over and over and over about a taco smh 😔

attributes.title: F Trump 🤬🤬
attributes.review: Why would anyone vote for his racist self?!!! This is the worst app and shouldn’t be out I hate Donald trump he’s a ra_ist (p or c) he literally ruins people’s lives he’s also sexist and what do y’all see in him? The man is orange and hair can’t even stay on his bald head he lets the police brutality continue he doesn’t care about us not even the white people

attributes.title: Bad app.
attributes.review: This app me my entire phone shut down for five minutes and it took a whole month to download I don’t like to stop at all I also tried to download it to see why I should vote for Trump and it gave me no reason to he is disgusting and so is this app I would say take this app off the App Store.

attributes.title: Trash😤
attributes.review: THIS APP SUCKSSSS. Took forever to download. When i tried to open it it kept shutting down and made my phone crash. When i actually got into the app it froze and i had to fully restart my phone. This app is horrible. I would give it -5 stars if i could. I do not recommend this!!!!!
